name: get_hillshading_tile
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool mapilion_vector_and_raster_map_tiles.
Tool description: Mapilion provides you with vector and raster map tiles at scale. Based on OpenStreetMap and OpenMapTiles.
API description: Returns special hillshading Raster tiles as PNG. Hillshading can be used as an overlay to create the look and feel of mountains. The version can be either v1 or v2.

x.description: The x coordinate of the tile.

version.description: The version of the hillshading tile, either 'v1' or 'v2'.

z.description: The zoom level of the tile.

y.description: The y coordinate of the tile.
